blog.name: i-used-to-wear-the-fedora
blog.title: I'm a Monster Without a Fedora
blog.description: Formerly Monsterunderthefedora

summary: My Hero Academia My Mountain Mom AU, What Just Happened?
body:
My Hero Academia My Mountain Mom AU, What Just Happened?

“I’m sorry my young boy, but someone of your restrictions…I don’t believe it’s possible.” That was all Izuku got. The crowd pushed him behind, all swarming around the hero. Praising him for the rescue of Bakugo. The green haired boy felt tears prick the corners of his eyes as he felt his body start to move on its own.

“It’s it possible…I could be a hero like you?” Izuku knew he shouldn’t have expected anything else. But he hoped his number one hero might at least support him. No one there could now.

“Sweetie…I love you so much, powers or not. You’ll always be my hero.” Those were the last words his mom said to him in the hospital. She wasn’t supposed to get sick. It wasn’t fair she died. It wasn’t fair that he was on his own now. God…none of this was fair.

Izuku tried not to cry as he remembered his mom. Bakugo was right. He would never be anything.

“Do us all a favor Deku and kill yourself. At least then you could make the world less shitty.”

Izuku’s childhood friend’s voice rang in his head as he stumbled back to the now almost empty school. Maybe it would be better for everyone if he just…disappeared.

~~

“-and the day was saved by the amazing All Might!! He single handedly defeated the sludge villain and saved young student, Bakugo Katsuki from certain death!” The news reporter excitedly went on. Yu Takeyama huffed as the older hero hogged the camera.

‘No fair,’ the woman slunked off, shoving past a civilian, 'this was supposed to be my debut. And here comes this geezer to take all the credit. Number one hero my ass.’

The woman sighed as she ran a hand through her hair.

“Whatever, I can try again tomorrow,” the woman’s stomach growled loudly. Reaching into her wallet she frowned to see some lint and a Starbucks punch card. “Ugh…ramen it is.”

The woman began walking down the street to her apartments when she stopped in front of a middle school. On the rooftop was a green haired boy sitting on the edge of the railing. He looked like he’d been crying as he teetered on the edge before letting go. It took the woman a moment to realize what was going on.

“Holy fuck-” Before she knew it she was growing as she ran towards the school. Catching the boy in one hand she carefully set him down before shrinking.

“Okay kid. What the hell were you doing?” The boy gaped at the hero when there was a flash behind her. Turning she saw one of the reporters from earlier standing there, holding a camera while the woman next to him filmed.

Not exactly how she thought she’d make her hero debut but she’d take it.

summary: What's the difference between BNHA and MHA? I haven't watched either and I want to know which one I should watch first and what...
question: What's the difference between BNHA and MHA? I haven't watched either and I want to know which one I should watch first and what the difference is. Is it point of view or what?
answer: So, there isn’t a difference, they’re different acronyms for the same show. Some people call it my hero academia, others call it boku no hero academia, it’s the same show. If you’re going to try to watch it please let me know and we can geek out over it it’s such a good show!

question: 38 with Todo please
answer:
Traditional with Shouto Todoroki

I’ve been at Camp all week so I just now got WiFi to be able to post this! Sorry!

It was the first time you two had actually decided to be intimate with each other without being interrupted by some villain while one of you were on call, if not both.

You both had an off day with no on-call days left in the week. It was just the both of you. Alone. In his house.

He was slow to initiate the contact at first. He placed a hand on your face and looked you in the eyes, like he was searching for something, something to tell him to stop. He never saw a sign of discomfort and leaned in fully to kiss you flush on the lips. You closed your eyes into the kiss and brought your hand up to meet his on your face.

He was gentle, passionate, full of love. He kept his eyes on your features and body to see if there was any kind of uneasiness. He kept his hands where he was familiar with and never farther. He kept his morals clean and crisp.

Then he did something you were not expecting and moved your head to the side to kiss along your neck. He liked at your flesh and lightly nipped in places, but never hard enough to leave marks. You, in surprise, brought your hand up to his shoulder which caused him to freeze and pull back slowly.

“Is that too much,” He would ask you kindly in his smooth voice causing you to swallow hard.

“No, continue… please.” You tried to mimic his politeness and he gave a little smile before moving his hands to your hips.

“May I move you someplace more comfortable?” You looked at him quizzically before nodding slowly. He stood up and pulled you up by the hand before grabbing below your butt and hoisting you up onto his waist, in which you wrapped your legs tightly around him.

You were brought to his room, which you were familiar with from so many dates and almosts. He kissed you deeply and moved you towards the bed. His hands were holding you tight and his stomach muscles flexed with slight strain but he seemed unworried.

His hetero chromatic eyes stared into your own for a moment before he leaned down and laid you down onto the silky bedspread. You kept your hands on his shoulders as he loomed over you until he pulled back and pulled off his shirt.

He moved to the hem of your shirt but he hesitated and looked down before biting his lip in a look you had not seen on him many times, “What is it?”

“I… I don’t know if you will like me. I… I’ve never done this before with anyone. You are my first. I’ve been waiting for you.” He let out before looking back to your eyes. You smiled before sitting up and pulling him into a soft kiss.

“You’re my first too, if we mess up, we’ll mess up together.” You tried to reassure him. It seemed to boost his self confidence a little and made him kiss you back just as nice.

-Sorry it really isn’t NS/FW… I began writing it and before I knew it the drabble was over 500 words which is my limit for scenarios…

He was slow to initiate the contact at first. He placed a hand on your face and looked you in the eyes, like he was searching for something, something to tell him to stop. summary:
Disaster AU: Enji Todoroki
PTSD and Bipolar Disorder
Help this gay idiot
Russian garbage
Loves his kids too much but he's still...
body:
Disaster AU: Enji Todoroki

  • PTSD and Bipolar Disorder
  • Help this gay idiot
  • Russian garbage
  • Loves his kids too much but he’s still like
  • “Do your best. Your best is winning. Win”
  • Also head of Apex
  • Let him fire Hawks for the love of god–
  • He fucking loves flowers
  • Sometimes Shoto comes home and just,, what house? I only know flower storage area.
  • “I’ve told you this 100 times that’s a debit card. Credit cards are for poor people.”

summary:
Mother of quirks 
Chapter 232: Meta ability and “Quirk”
Rough translation so take it with a grain of salt:
Redestro throws...
body:
Mother of quirks

Chapter 232: Meta ability and “Quirk”


Rough translation so take it with a grain of salt:




Redestro throws everyone around with his giantified black arm. He talks about when discrimination against meta abilities was still common, and about the “Mother of Quirks” who was killed yelling “this is the child’s Quirk, I want them to be able to live freely!” (?)

Meta abilities were rethought of as “Quirks”, but that’s all just the repression of meta abilities. Destro felt this isn’t the future the mother (his mother?) wanted.

Redestro and the others carry on Destro’s blood, making their mission more important than the League of Villains. Shigaraki was there below and destroys the tower.

Redestro and Shigaraki face each other— and finally clash.
